title: E-Learning-Based Constructivist Science Class Design: Theory and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course enabling pre-service and in-service teachers to design e-learning lessons applying constructivist principles in science education

learning_goals: Explain e-learning instructional design frameworks for science subjects based on constructivism and experiential learning theories
Create a one-session e-learning module including collaborative problem-solving activities on Zoom platforms and BYOD environments
When designing learning activities, one can propose content organization strategies that apply digital media theories (e.g., multimedia learning principles).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
